# 2025 Edition at a Glance

- **Day:** Wednesday 9th, April 2025.
- **Time:** 8am - 5pm CT
- **Where:** MU Bond Life Sciences Center Building (virtual option available)

Click [here](./program.html) more information about the program.

- [**Tessa Burch-Smith**](https://www.danforthcenter.org/our-work/principal-investigators/tessa-burch-smith/), Donald Danforth Plant Science Center
- [**Malia Gehan**](https://www.danforthcenter.org/our-work/principal-investigators/malia-gehan/), Donald Danforth Plant Science Center

# Participate

Registration is **FREE** and open. [Click here to register](https://forms.gle/fonpWPpG6ina7ei56). Please register to your earliest convenience so we can plan meals accordingly.

You are also invited to present your work at the Symposium. Oral presentations, lightning talks, and poster spots available. [Submit your abstract here](https://forms.gle/49at15CQVfPgbUwP7).

**Deadline for abstract submission:** March 15th, 2025.
